query.name: qryApplicationWithTaskId
query.source: SELECT EWFApplications.* FROM EWFApplications, EWFTasks WHERE (EWFApplications.applicationId = EWFTasks.applicationId) AND (EWFTasks.taskId = %1)

query.name: qryPartTasksQuickBar
query.source: SELECT EWFTaskBars.itemLabel, EWFTaskBars.presentationOrder, EWFTasks.taskId, EWFTasks.taskShortName, EWFTasks.taskDescription, EWFParticipantTasks.participantId, EWFApplications.appStatus FROM EWFTaskBars, EWFTasks, EWFParticipantTasks, EWFApplications WHERE (EWFTasks.taskId = EWFParticipantTasks.taskId (+)) AND (EWFApplications.applicationId (+) = EWFTasks.applicationId) AND (EWFTaskBars.taskId = EWFTasks.taskId (+)) AND (EWFParticipantTasks.participantId (+) = %1) AND (EWFTaskBars.taskBarType = 'M') AND (EWFApplications.appStatus (+) = 'R') ORDER BY EWFTaskBars.presentationOrder

query.name: qryPartToDoItemsCounters
query.source: SELECT itemType, COUNT(*) counter FROM MHInboxes WHERE (toParticipantId = %1) OR (toParticipantId IN ( SELECT participantAId FROM MHParticipantsRelations WHERE (participantBId = %1) and (RelationTypeId = 1301) )) GROUP BY itemType
